20101215025102.000|20101215025103.000|CCO|       COPD makes it hard
20101215025103.000|20101215025104.000|CCO|       for me to breathe.
20101215025104.000|20101215025105.000|CCO|        But with ADVAIR,
20101215025105.000|20101215025106.000|CCO|      I'm breathing better.
20101215025106.000|20101215025107.000|CCO| So now, I can join the fun and
20101215025107.000|20101215025108.000|CCO|  games with my grandchildren.
20101215025108.000|20101215025109.000|CCO|           Great news!
20101215025109.000|20101215025110.000|CCO|      For people with COPD,
20101215025110.000|20101215025111.000|CCO|  including chronic bronchitis,
20101215025111.000|20101215025112.667|CCO|       emphysema, or both,
20101215025112.667|20101215025114.333|CCO|   ADVAIR helps significantly
20101215025114.333|20101215025116.000|CCO|     improve lung function.
20101215025116.000|20101215025117.667|CCO| While nothing can reverse COPD,
20101215025117.667|20101215025119.333|CCO|  ADVAIR is different from most
20101215025119.333|20101215025121.000|CCO|     other COPD medications
20101215025121.000|20101215025122.250|CCO|       because it contains
20101215025122.250|20101215025123.500|CCO|    both an anti-inflammatory
20101215025123.500|20101215025124.750|CCO|        and a long-acting
20101215025124.750|20101215025126.000|CCO|         bronchodilator,
20101215025126.000|20101215025127.250|CCO|        working together
20101215025127.250|20101215025128.500|CCO|   to help you breathe better.
20101215025128.500|20101215025129.750|CCO|ADVAIR won't replace fast-acting
20101215025129.750|20101215025131.000|CCO|  inhalers for sudden symptoms
20101215025131.000|20101215025132.000|CCO|        and should not be
20101215025132.000|20101215025133.000|CCO|   used more than twice a day.
20101215025133.000|20101215025134.000|CCO| People with COPD taking ADVAIR
20101215025134.000|20101215025135.000|CCO|    may have a higher chance
20101215025135.000|20101215025136.000|CCO|          of pneumonia.
20101215025136.000|20101215025137.000|CCO|       ADVAIR may increase
20101215025137.000|20101215025138.000|CCO|    your risk of osteoporosis
20101215025138.000|20101215025139.000|CCO|     and some eye problems.
20101215025139.000|20101215025140.000|CCO|        Tell your doctor
20101215025140.000|20101215025141.000|CCO|  if you have a heart condition
20101215025141.000|20101215025142.667|CCO|     or high blood pressure
20101215025142.667|20101215025144.333|CCO|      before taking ADVAIR.
20101215025144.333|20101215025146.000|CCO|    I had fun today, Grandpa.
20101215025146.000|20101215025147.667|CCO|                You and me both.
